nodes.bodyText: {@code empty} above you removed the only occurrence of this in code, why it is added here?

this code do comparison of Xdoc (where we have "empty") with javadoc (where we have "").
So we need to keep xdco and javadoc in state as they are, so comparator code should be updated to treat them the same.

should have ',' & '.'

Probably 'and' should be 'or'
arguably it is better to make it should have comma and dot ....  instead of chars

fixed.





I would keep it exact.
